body_html:
Oh I just realized one probably big difference: the inception v1 model is about 50+MB and my retrained model, which is based on inception v3, is close to 90MB. Maybe that's why.

See my updates in #3619 on how to resolve the memory issue using the quantized v1 model running on actual device.

See my updates in #3619 on how to resolve the memory issue using the quantized v1 model running on actual device.
body:
Oh I just realized one probably big difference: the inception v1 model is about 50+MB and my retrained model, which is based on inception v3, is close to 90MB. Maybe that's why. 

See my updates in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/3619 on how to resolve the memory issue using the quantized v1 model running on actual device.
